title: Israel, Palestine, and Latin America: Conflitual Relationships
itunes:title: Israel, Palestine, and Latin America: Conflitual Relationships
description: In this episode of the Latin American Perspectives podcast Alexander Scott, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, discusses the origin, themes of the May 2019 issue, "Israel, Palestine, and Latin America: Conflictual Relationships," with guest co-editor Pablo Pozzi.
content:encoded: In this episode of the Latin American Perspectives podcast Alexander Scott, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, discusses the origin, themes of the May 2019 issue, "Israel, Palestine, and Latin America: Conflictual Relationships," with guest co-editor Pablo Pozzi.
itunes:subtitle: Latin American Perspectives May 2019 Podcast
